title: Delicious fried rice
description: A richly flavoured fried rice, deservingly titled 'delicious'. Kylie Kwong packs in the flavours to a simple dish.
ingredients: 75ml/2½fl oz peanut oil, plus 1 tbsp extra
125g/4½oz rindless bacon rashers or Chinese sausage, roughly chopped
2 tbsp shao hsing wine (Chinese rice wine)
2 spring onions (scallions), finely sliced on the diagonal
½ large red chilli, finely sliced on the diagonal
